channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024010460
item.description:
Report X-2024010460

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-03
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped causing damage to the contents. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin. Chemical neutralizer and Oil Dry absorbent were used on spilled liquid, swept up and placed in the lined bin with the pkg which was placed on a rolling cart and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: A 1/4" puncture was found in the bottom of the carton and in the bottom of 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin. Excess chemical neutralizer was placed into an unauthorized unlined bin.

item.title: Report X-2024010449
item.description:
Report X-2024010449

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-27
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was shipped with no Hazmat markings, required Hazmat Certification or OP-900LL Hazmat tags. Pkg contains a gasoline powered portable generator with gasoline still in the fuel tank. Crankcase oil wet the contents and carton. Pkg was placed on end on a rolling cart and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose oil dipstick and fuel cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed on cart.

item.title: Report X-2024010454
item.description:
Report X-2024010454

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-19T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Damaged contents leaked wetting the contents and carton causing the carton to rip and become partially dissolved. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Sem cracked approximately 1" inside the handle of 1 x 1 gal plastic bottle. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin with absorbent pads.
